meanings: (수량, 정도) more, (정도) further, (거리) farther, (하나 더) another, (다시) again, (조금 더) some[a few, a little] more
neither more than that nor less than that

phrases.phrase: 더도 말고 덜도 말고 늘 한가위만 같아라
meanings: I wish things were always like they are on Hangawi, the Korean Thanksgiving Day, neither more than that nor less than that
